        struct UVSet {
                MFloatArray u;
                MFloatArray v;
        };

        ResourceManager::ResourceManager(PluginContext* bpc) : m_bpc(bpc) {
        }

        ResourceManager::~ResourceManager() {
        }

        BeastMeshPtr ResourceManager::createMesh(MDagPath dp, MObjectArray& surfaceShaders, const std::wstring& overrideName, std::vector<unsigned int>* beastToMayaTriMapping) {
                MStatus res;
                BeastManager& bm = m_bpc->getManager();

                if (dp.extendToShape() != MStatus::kSuccess) {
                        // No shape, fail.
                        return BeastMeshPtr();
                }

                MFnMesh mesh(dp, &res);
                if(res != MStatus::kSuccess) {
                        // No mesh, fail.
                        return BeastMeshPtr();
                }

                std::wstring indexingId = getMeshShaders(mesh, dp.instanceNumber(), surfaceShaders);

                std::wstringstream uniqueName;
                uniqueName << getUniqueResourceName(mesh) << indexingId;

                // Materials are referenced by hash name
                MStringArray shaderNames;
                for (unsigned int i = 0; i < surfaceShaders.length(); i++) {
                        std::wstringstream name;
                        name << MObjectHandle(surfaceShaders[i]).hashCode();
                        shaderNames.append(name.str().c_str());
                        // Mesh is built with material references so we add them to the unique mesh name.
                        uniqueName << "_" << name.str();
                }
                uniqueName << "_" << overrideName;

                BeastMeshPtr cachedMesh = bm.findMesh(uniqueName.str().c_str());
                if(cachedMesh) {
                        return cachedMesh;
                }

                MeshGeometry meshGeometry;
                getMeshGeometry(mesh, dp.instanceNumber(), meshGeometry, beastToMayaTriMapping);

                if(meshGeometry.empty()) {
                        // No mesh, fail.
                        return BeastMeshPtr();
                }

                MStringArray uvSetNames;
                mesh.getUVSetNames(uvSetNames);

                BeastMeshPtr beastMesh = exportMesh(uniqueName.str(), meshGeometry, shaderNames, uvSetNames);


                // Add callback to track when the resource goes dirty
                m_resourceCallbacks.erase(mesh.object());
                m_resourceCallbacks.insert(std::make_pair(mesh.object(), NodeMessageObjectPtr(new ResourceNode(mesh.object()))));

                return beastMesh;
        }

        std::wstring ResourceManager::getMeshShaders(MFnMesh& mesh, unsigned int instanceNumber, MObjectArray& surfaceShaders) {
                MStatus res;
                // Shader to polygon mapping
                MObjectArray shaders;
                MIntArray shaderIndices;
                mesh.getConnectedShaders(instanceNumber, shaders, shaderIndices);

                // Find connected surface shaders
                surfaceShaders.clear();
                for (unsigned int i = 0; i < shaders.length(); i++) {
                        MFnDependencyNode shadingGroup(shaders[i]);
                        std::pair<MObject, std::wstring> materialPair = getConnectedNode(shadingGroup, L"surfaceShader");
                        if (materialPair.first != MObject::kNullObj) {
                                MObject shaderObject(materialPair.first);
                                surfaceShaders.append(shaderObject);
                        } else {
                                // No material assigned so use the default
                                surfaceShaders.append(findMayaNode(L"lambert1"));
                        }
                }

                // Create an ID string corresponding to the index list
                std::wstringstream indexingId;
                for (unsigned int i = 1; i < shaderIndices.length(); i++) {
                        int prev = shaderIndices[i-1];
                        int count = 1;
                        while (prev == shaderIndices[i]) {
                                count++;
                                i++;
                                if (i >= shaderIndices.length()) {
                                        break;
                                }
                        }
                        indexingId << "_" << prev << "-" << count;
                }
                return indexingId.str();
        }

        void ResourceManager::getMeshGeometry(MFnMesh& mesh, unsigned int instanceNumber, MeshGeometry& meshGeometry, std::vector<unsigned int>* beastToMayaTriMapping) {

                // Shader to polygon mapping
                MObjectArray shaders;
                MIntArray shaderIndices;
                mesh.getConnectedShaders(instanceNumber, shaders, shaderIndices);

                // Temp storage for vertex indexing
                std::vector<int> vertexIndexRemap;
                vertexIndexRemap.resize(mesh.numVertices());

                // Vertex positions
                MFloatPointArray points;
                mesh.getPoints(points);

                // Vertex normals
                MFloatVectorArray normals;
                mesh.getNormals(normals);

                // Vertex tangents
                MFloatVectorArray tangents, bitangents;
                mesh.getTangents(tangents);
                mesh.getBinormals(bitangents);

                // UV-sets
                MStringArray uvSetNames;
                mesh.getUVSetNames(uvSetNames);

                std::vector<UVSet> uvsets;
                uvsets.resize(uvSetNames.length());
                for (unsigned int i = 0; i < uvSetNames.length(); i++) {
                        mesh.getUVs(uvsets[i].u, uvsets[i].v, &uvSetNames[i]);
                }

                // Make room for stuff.
                meshGeometry.uvs.resize(uvsets.size());
                meshGeometry.triangles.resize(shaders.length() + 1);

                std::vector<unsigned int> shaderGroupTriCount;
                if (beastToMayaTriMapping) {
                        shaderGroupTriCount.resize(shaders.length() + 1);
                }

                // Go through all polys and fill meshGeometry accordingly
                int vertexID = 0;
                MItMeshPolygon piter(mesh.object());
                while(!piter.isDone()) {

                        // Vertices
                        MIntArray polyIndices;
                        piter.getVertices(polyIndices);
                        for (unsigned int i = 0; i < polyIndices.length(); i++) {
                                vertexIndexRemap[polyIndices[i]] = vertexID;

                                int vIdx = piter.vertexIndex(i);
                                meshGeometry.vertices.push_back(toBeastVector(points[vIdx]));

                                int nIdx = piter.normalIndex(i);
                                meshGeometry.normals.push_back(toBeastVector(normals[nIdx]));

                                int tIdx = piter.tangentIndex(i);
                                if((unsigned int)tIdx < tangents.length() && (unsigned int)tIdx < bitangents.length()) {
                                        meshGeometry.tangents.push_back(toBeastVector(tangents[tIdx]));
                                        meshGeometry.bitangents.push_back(toBeastVector(bitangents[tIdx]));
                                }

                                for (int setIdx = 0; setIdx < int(uvsets.size()); setIdx++) {
                                        int uvIdx;
                                        piter.getUVIndex(i, uvIdx, &uvSetNames[setIdx]);
                                        ILBVec2 uv(0, 0);
                                        // We can get UV indices that are outside the UV array size.
                                        // For now we fall back to 0, 0
                                        if((unsigned int)uvIdx < uvsets[setIdx].u.length() && (unsigned int)uvIdx < uvsets[setIdx].v.length() && uvIdx >= 0) {
                                                uv = ILBVec2(uvsets[setIdx].u[uvIdx], uvsets[setIdx].v[uvIdx]);
                                        }
                                        
                                        meshGeometry.uvs[setIdx].push_back(uv);
                                }
                                vertexID++;
                        }
                        
                        if(meshGeometry.bitangents.size() < meshGeometry.vertices.size() || meshGeometry.tangents.size() < meshGeometry.vertices.size()) {
                                // We don't have valid tangent or bitangent data here, erase it
                                meshGeometry.bitangents.clear();
                                meshGeometry.tangents.clear();
                        }

                        // Shader index for this poly. Adding one because unassigned will be -1 and we don't like negative indexing.
                        int sIdx = shaderIndices[piter.index()] + 1;

                        // Triangulation
                        MPointArray points;
                        MIntArray vertexList;
                        piter.getTriangles(points, vertexList);
                        for (unsigned int i = 0; i < vertexList.length(); i++) {
                                meshGeometry.triangles[sIdx].push_back(vertexIndexRemap[vertexList[i]]);
                        }
                        if (beastToMayaTriMapping) {
                                const unsigned int numTris = vertexList.length() / 3;
                                shaderGroupTriCount[sIdx] += numTris;
                                for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numTris; i++) {
                                        beastToMayaTriMapping->push_back(sIdx);
                                }
                        }
                        piter.next();
                }
                if (beastToMayaTriMapping) {
                        unsigned int runningTotal = 0;
                        for (unsigned int i = 0; i < shaderGroupTriCount.size(); ++i) {
                                unsigned int n = shaderGroupTriCount[i];
                                shaderGroupTriCount[i] = runningTotal;
                                runningTotal += n;
                        }
                        for (unsigned int i = 0; i < beastToMayaTriMapping->size(); i++) {
                                unsigned int sIdx = (*beastToMayaTriMapping)[i];
                                (*beastToMayaTriMapping)[i] = shaderGroupTriCount[sIdx];
                                shaderGroupTriCount[sIdx]++;
                        }
                }

        }

        BeastMeshPtr ResourceManager::exportMesh(const std::wstring& name, MeshGeometry& meshGeometry, MStringArray& shadersNames, MStringArray& uvSetNames) {
                BeastManager& bm = m_bpc->getManager();

                BeastMeshPtr beastMesh = bm.beginMesh(name.c_str());

                // Write vertices
                beastMesh->addVertexData(&meshGeometry.vertices[0], &meshGeometry.normals[0], int32(meshGeometry.vertices.size()));

                // Write tangents
                if(meshGeometry.tangents.size() > 0) {
                        // Add tangents if we have tangent data for the mesh
                        beastMesh->beginTangents();
                        beastMesh->addTangentData(&meshGeometry.tangents[0], &meshGeometry.bitangents[0], int32(meshGeometry.tangents.size()));
                        beastMesh->endTangents();
                }

                // Write UV-sets
                for(unsigned int i = 0; i < uvSetNames.length(); i++) {
                        beastMesh->beginUVLayer(uvSetNames[i].asWChar());
                        beastMesh->addUVData(&meshGeometry.uvs[i][0], int32(meshGeometry.uvs[i].size()));
                        beastMesh->endUVLayer();
                }

                // Write triangulation per material
                for (unsigned int i = 0; i < shadersNames.length() + 1; i++) { // +1 because there could be polygons with no shader assigned and we want those as well

                        if (meshGeometry.triangles[i].size() == 0) {
                                continue;
                        }

                        // First group of triangles has no material assigned... so it's usually empty.
                        std::wstring materialName;
                        if (i == 0) {
                                std::wstringstream defaultMaterialName;
                                defaultMaterialName << MObjectHandle(findMayaNode(L"lambert1")).hashCode();
                                materialName = defaultMaterialName.str();
                        } else {
                                materialName = shadersNames[i-1].asWChar();
                        }

                        beastMesh->beginMaterialGroup(materialName.c_str());
                        beastMesh->addTriangleData(&meshGeometry.triangles[i][0], int32(meshGeometry.triangles[i].size()));
                        beastMesh->endMaterialGroup();
                }

                beastMesh->endMesh();
                return beastMesh;
        }

        void getResolutionOverride(const MObject& node, int& width, int& height) {
                int newWidth, newHeight;
                if (!getPlugValue(node, L"outSizeX", newWidth)) {
                        return;
                }
                if (!getPlugValue(node, L"outSizeY", newHeight)) {
                        return;
                }
                // Clamp the new size with the original size, also make 0 pixel textures have a size of 1
                width = std::max(std::min(newWidth, width), 1);
                height = std::max(std::min(newHeight, height), 1);
        }

        MObject getNormalMapNode(const MObject& node) {
                MStatus res;
                MFnDependencyNode bumpDN(node, &res);
                if(res != MStatus::kSuccess) {
                        // Not a dependency node connected. Assume something is very wrong
                        return MObject::kNullObj;
                }
                MPlug nmType = bumpDN.findPlug("bumpInterp", &res);
                if(res != MStatus::kSuccess) {
                        // No Bump 2d node connected, let's treat it like it's not bumped
                        return MObject::kNullObj;
                }
                if(nmType.asInt() != 1) {
                        // Not a tangent space normal map, treat it like it's not bumped
                        return MObject::kNullObj;
                }
                // Now we know we have a bump node in tangent space normal map mode, let's sample
                // its input normal. Here we need to assume that what's connected is connected
                // through alpha even if we mean to sample its color
                std::pair<MObject, std::wstring> normalMapConnection = getConnectedNode(bumpDN, L"bumpValue");
                MFnDependencyNode normalMapDN(normalMapConnection.first, &res);
                if(res != MStatus::kSuccess) {
                        // Not a dependency node connected. Assume something is very wrong
                        return MObject::kNullObj;
                }
                MPlug normalMapOutColor = normalMapDN.findPlug(L"outColor", true, &res);
                if (res != MStatus::kSuccess) {
                        // We didn't find something with outColor as output.
                        // The best we can do is treat it like it's not normal mapped
                } else {
                        return normalMapConnection.first;
                }
                return MObject::kNullObj;
        }

        BeastTexturePtr ResourceManager::createTexture(MObject node, std::wstring output, int width, int height, bool normalMap, bool flipHorizontally, bool flipVertically) {
                MStatus res;
                BeastManager& bm = m_bpc->getManager();

                MObject fileNode = node;
                if(normalMap) {
                        MObject normalMapFileNode = getNormalMapNode(node);
                        if(normalMapFileNode == MObject::kNullObj) {
                                MGlobal::displayWarning(L"BEAST: Only tangent space normal maps supported");
                                return BeastTexturePtr();
                        }
                        // Success, we have a normal map file texture
                        output = L"outColor";
                        node = fileNode = normalMapFileNode;
                }

                MFnDependencyNode shader(node, &res);
                if (res != MStatus::kSuccess) {
                        // No texture, fail.
                        return BeastTexturePtr();
                }

                getResolutionOverride(node, width, height);

                MObject settingsNode = findMayaNode(L"beastSettings");
                bool useFile = false;
                bool removeDuplicateTextures = false;
                if (settingsNode != MObject::kNullObj) {
                        getPlugValue(settingsNode, L"useTextureFile", useFile);
                        getPlugValue(settingsNode, L"removeDuplicateTextures", removeDuplicateTextures);                        
                }

                std::wstring resourceName = getUniqueResourceName(shader);

                MString fileTextureName;
                if (useFile && !flipHorizontally && !flipVertically) {
                        fileTextureName = MRenderUtil::exactFileTextureName(fileNode);
                        if(removeDuplicateTextures && fileTextureName.length() != 0) {
                                resourceName = fileTextureName.asWChar();
                        }
                }

                // Construct a unique name
                std::wstringstream uniqueName;
                uniqueName << resourceName << "_" << width << "x" << height << "_" << flipHorizontally << flipVertically << useFile;

                // Check if it's already available in cache
                BeastTexturePtr result = bm.findTexture(uniqueName.str().c_str());
                if(result) {
                        return result;
                }

                // Reference texture file directly
                if (fileTextureName.length() != 0) {
                        BeastTexturePtr tex = bm.referenceTexture(fileTextureName.asWChar(), uniqueName.str().c_str());
                        if(normalMap) {
                                tex->setInputGamma(1.0f);
                        } 
                        return tex;
                }

                // Sample texture
                const int sampleCount = width * height;
                MFloatVectorArray texelData;
                texelData.setLength(sampleCount);

                MFloatArray uVec(sampleCount, 0.0f);
                MFloatArray vVec(sampleCount, 0.0f);
                MFloatArray filter(sampleCount, 1.0f / (float)width);

                MFloatArray tempY(height, 0.0f);
                MFloatArray tempX(width, 0.0f);

                for(int y = 0; y < height; ++y) {
                        if (!flipVertically) {
                                tempY[y] = ((float)y + 0.5f) / (float)height;
                        } else {
                                tempY[y] = ((float)height - 0.5f - (float)y) / (float)height;
                        }
                }

                for(int x = 0; x < width; ++x) {
                        if (!flipHorizontally) {
                                tempX[x] = ((float)x + 0.5f) / (float)width;
                        } else {
                                tempX[x] = ((float)width - 0.5f - (float)x) / (float)width;
                        }
                }

                for(int y = 0; y < height; ++y) {
                        for(int x = 0; x < width; ++x) {
                                int idx = x + y * width;
                                uVec[idx] = tempX[x];
                                vVec[idx] = tempY[y];
                        }
                }

                MFloatVectorArray transData;
                MFloatMatrix mtx;
                std::wstring completeName = std::wstring(shader.name().asWChar()) + L"." + output;
                res = MRenderUtil::sampleShadingNetwork(completeName.c_str(), sampleCount, false, false, mtx, 0, &uVec, &vVec, 0, 0, 0, 0, &filter, texelData, transData);
                CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN(res, BeastTexturePtr());
                assert(texelData.length() == sampleCount);
                if(texelData.length() != sampleCount) {
                        texelData.setLength(sampleCount);
                }

                // First identify if we need HDR
                bool needHDR = false;

                for(int y = 0; y < height; ++y) {
                        for(int x = 0; x < width; ++x) {
                                int idx = x + y * width;
                                if(std::max(texelData[idx].x, std::max(texelData[idx].y, texelData[idx].z)) > 1.0f) {
                                        needHDR = true;
                                        break;
                                }
                        }
                }
                if(needHDR) {
                        result = bm.beginTexture(uniqueName.str().c_str(), width, height, ILB_PF_RGB_FLOAT);
                        // Is the conversion here kosher?
                        result->addPixelDataHDR(reinterpret_cast<const float*>(&texelData[0]), width * height);
                } else {
                        result = bm.beginTexture(uniqueName.str().c_str(), width, height, ILB_PF_RGB_BYTE);
                        std::vector<unsigned char> ldrData(width * height * 3);

                        if(normalMap) {
                                result->setInputGamma(1.0f);
                        } 
                        
                        for(int y = 0; y < height; ++y) {
                                for(int x = 0; x < width; ++x) {
                                        int idx = x + y * width;
                                        const MFloatVector& col = texelData[idx];
                                        // Assume this is gamma corrected data?
                                        ldrData[idx * 3 + 0] = static_cast<const unsigned char>(col.x * 255.0f);
                                        ldrData[idx * 3 + 1] = static_cast<const unsigned char>(col.y * 255.0f);
                                        ldrData[idx * 3 + 2] = static_cast<const unsigned char>(col.z * 255.0f);
                                }
                        }

                        result->addPixelDataLDR(&ldrData[0], width * height);
                }
                result->endTexture();

                // Add callback to track when the resource goes dirty
                m_resourceCallbacks.erase(shader.object());
                m_resourceCallbacks.insert(std::make_pair(shader.object(), NodeMessageObjectPtr(new ResourceNode(shader.object()))));

                return result;
        }

        BeastShaderPtr ResourceManager::createShader(std::wstring fileName) {
                 // Replace slashes so that cache keys are consistent.
                std::replace(fileName.begin(), fileName.end(), '\\', '/');

                HANDLE hFile = CreateFile(fileName.c_str(), GENERIC_READ, 0, NULL, OPEN_EXISTING, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, NULL);
                if (INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE == hFile) {
                        // There is no file?
                        return BeastShaderPtr();
                }

                FILETIME lastWriteTime;
                if (!GetFileTime(hFile, NULL, NULL, &lastWriteTime)) {
                        CloseHandle(hFile);
                        return BeastShaderPtr();
                }
                CloseHandle(hFile);

                // Construct unique name from filename and date modified.
                std::wstringstream uniqueName;
                uniqueName << fileName << "_" << lastWriteTime.dwHighDateTime << lastWriteTime.dwLowDateTime;

                BeastManager& bm = m_bpc->getManager();
                BeastShaderPtr cachedShader = bm.findShader(uniqueName.str().c_str());
                if(cachedShader) {
                        return cachedShader;
                }

                return bm.createShader(uniqueName.str().c_str(), fileName.c_str());
        }

        std::wstring ResourceManager::getUniqueResourceName(MFnDependencyNode& node) {
                if (!node.hasAttribute("beastUniqueResourceName")) {
                        MFnTypedAttribute tattr;
                        MObject mo;

                        mo = tattr.create("beastUniqueResourceName", "burn", MFnData::kString);
                        tattr.addToCategory("Beast");
                        tattr.setStorable(false);
                        node.addAttribute(mo);
                }
                
                MString beastUniqueResourceName;
                getPlugValue(node, L"beastUniqueResourceName", beastUniqueResourceName);
                if (beastUniqueResourceName == "") {
                        beastUniqueResourceName.setWChar(getGuid().c_str());
                        setPlugValue(node, L"beastUniqueResourceName", beastUniqueResourceName);
                }

                std::wstringstream result;
                result << MObjectHandle(node.object()).hashCode() << "_" << beastUniqueResourceName.asWChar();

                return result.str();
        }

        BeastTexturePtr ResourceManager::getBlackTexture()
        {
                if (m_blackTexture.get() == NULL) {
                        m_blackTexture = createColorTextureLDR(0, 0, 0);
                }

                return m_blackTexture;
        }

        BeastTexturePtr ResourceManager::getWhiteTexture()
        {
                if (m_whiteTexture.get() == NULL) {
                        m_whiteTexture = createColorTextureLDR(255, 255, 255);
                }

                return m_whiteTexture;
        }

        BeastTexturePtr ResourceManager::createColorTextureLDR(unsigned char r, unsigned char g, unsigned char b)
        {
                BeastManager& bm = m_bpc->getManager();

                std::wstring name = getGuid();
                BeastTexturePtr texture = bm.beginTexture(name.c_str(), 1, 1, ILB_PF_RGB_BYTE);
                unsigned char data[] = { r, g, b };
                texture->addPixelDataLDR(data, 1);
                texture->endTexture();

                return texture;
        }
